summary: This is an email from a Special Agent in the Office of the Inspector General regarding new information about a phone call made by Jeffrey Epstein on the evening of Friday, August 9, 2019, while he was in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. It clarifies that Epstein was never in general population and was supervised during a legal visit earlier that day.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased financier and sex offender who was in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center; the subject of the phone call investigation.

persons.name: Modano
persons.context: The OIG SAC who was briefed by the Warden about the details of Epstein's phone call.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: The warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center who briefed OIG SAC Modano about the length of Epstein's phone call.

connections.description: The Warden briefed OIG SAC Modano about the details of Jeffrey Epstein's phone call.
Epstein was an inmate under the custody and supervision of the Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Epstein's Legal Visit and Phone Call
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein had a legal visit from approximately 8:00 AM until almost 7:00 PM, supervised by BOP staff. Later that evening, he made a 19-minute phone call at 7:17 PM.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (implied, as the detention facility where Epstein was held)
1 Battery Park Plaza, 29th floor, New York, NY 10004 (Office of the Inspector General address)
keyFacts: A 19-minute phone call was made by Jeffrey Epstein at 7:17 PM on Friday, August 9, 2019, while he was in custody.
Epstein was never placed in general population at the correctional center, which exempted him from needing an approved call list.
On the same day as the phone call, Epstein had a supervised legal visit lasting from approximately 8:00 AM to almost 7:00 PM.
The email is from a Special Agent in the Office of the Inspector General, indicating an internal review or investigation into Epstein's detention circumstances.
